meanings.definition: Having more straps or being more strap-like.
meanings.sent1: The new backpack is strappier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: She prefers strappier sandals for hiking.
meanings.sent3: The strappier belt kept her pants up during the dance-off.
meanings.sent4: His strappier watch seemed to hold time more securely.
meanings.sent5: The strappier guitar strap made playing more comfortable.

meanings.sent1: The strappier puppy ran circles around the yard.
meanings.sent2: The party got even strappier when the music started.
meanings.sent3: The strappier dance moves left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her strappier personality lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The strappier sports car zoomed down the road.
